price: (Ànábì) Mūsā sọ pé: “Ẹ̀yin ènìyàn mi, tí ẹ bá jẹ́ ẹni tó gbàgbọ́ nínú Allāhu, Òun náà ni kí ẹ gbáralé tí ẹ bá jẹ́ mùsùlùmí.”
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِن كُنتُمۡ ءَامَنتُم بِٱللَّهِ فَعَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلُوٓاْ إِن كُنتُم مُّسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā yāqawmi in kuntum āmantum bil-lahi faʿalayhi tawakkalū in kuntum mus'limīna
